page.title: 11Children's Hobbies,Eccleston
page.content: "In my spare time I go running. I do six or seven laps of the field near my house.Sometimes I go canoeing at weekends." "I play on my computer. I have about fifty games for it." "I am a Brownie. Brownies are girls who belong to a Brownie pack, which is made up of twenty-four girls. Our uniform is a brown tunic with two big pockets and a thick leather belt. We earn interest badges." "I am in a gymnastics club." "I play football,rounders and cricket. Sometimes I go fishing." "I go bird-watching. If I see a rare bird, I write down where I saw it, when, and its behaviour." "I have a horse called Sandy. I enjoy riding him. He is 11 and I have had him 3 years." - 10 year-olds
